description:
Focus on healing (Cellf) & trust your gut~ •
You know those sayings, “just trust your gut”, and “I have a gut feeling about this”, and “my gut instinct tells me”....? These sayings are telling you that it all starts in the gut- potentially our first brain.
If we are feeding our gut the wrong information with our food, creating mucus, acidity, inflammation (& artery plaque), it will affect our microbiome negatively, it will grow cancer cells & parasites, & will adversely affect our thoughts- & thus our actions, vibratory frequency, & the reality we create. •
We can take this time of Orwellian government-ordered “shelter in place” to fast, to create new workout routines, to incorporate new, HEALthier dietary 🌱regimens, to center, to create more balance & harmony in our lives- which will give us confidence that we have a lymph/sewer/immune system less susceptible to viruses & disease. •
We can also take this time to prepare & fortify our homes from the coming 5G small cells & infrastructure that is insidiously being installed as we speak. •
